metadata.title: CVE-2024-10941 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A malicious website could have included an iframe with an malformed URIresulting in a non-exploitable browser crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 126.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-10941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
